name: cubelib
description: Component of CubeBundle: General purpose C++ library and tools

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependent_to.name: scorep
dependent_to.description:
The Score-P measurement infrastructure is a highly scalable and easy-to-
use tool suite for profiling, event tracing, and online analysis of HPC
applications.

dependent_to.name: cube
dependent_to.description:
Cube the profile viewer for Score-P and Scalasca profiles. It displays a
multi-dimensional performance space consisting of the dimensions: -
performance metric - call path - system resource
